sources.title: W.C. Fields - The Dentist
sources.description: One of a number of shorts that W.C. Fields made before he went into feature films. The scene where he extracts the woman's tooth may be one of the funniest he made.

metadata.Plot: One of comedies true originals - the master of wit and good, mean fun, the curmudgeonly, and very original, the legendary W.C. Fields' is wonderfully portrayed by Rod Steiger in this off-beat biopic.
metadata.Writer: Bob Merrill, Carlotta Monti, Cy Rice
metadata.Actors: Rod Steiger, Valerie Perrine, John Marley
